'''Head To Tail''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing on the island of [[Angler's Grave]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Start a mission at the Angler's Jaws landing and leave through the Tear at the Tailfin Piers.</big>
